JUDGES: András Sajó;Françoise Tulkens;Ireneu Cabral Barreto;Nona Tsotsoria;Vladimiro Zagrebelsky
TEXT: The applicant , INDEX.HU PERSON , is a private joint stock company with its seat in GPE . It was represented before the ORG by PERSON , a lawyer practising in PERSON .

The applicant runs an internet - based news portal where it published the video footage of a demonstration . Several police officers – who had been filmed and whose images had been published without their consent LAW a civil - law action against the applicant before ORG , requesting the court to establish an abuse of their images .
The court found for the plaintiffs on DATE . ORG upheld this decision on DATE . The judgment was served on the applicant on CARDINAL DATE . It did not lodge a petition for review with ORG .
Act no . DATE on LAW provides as follows :
“ A petition for a review of the final decision by ORG may be filed , alleging a breach of the law , by any party ... ”

“ If the [ final ] decision ... was in breach of the law , ORG shall fully or partially quash the unlawful decision ; and if the facts of the case can properly be established on the basis of the case file , it shall give a new decision in compliance with the law , otherwise it shall instruct the first- or second - instance court in charge of the case to resume the proceedings and to adopt a new decision . ”
